attributes.action: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to implement a rule that states
attributes.additional_details: Please sign and pass this petition on if you support my objections to a current petition which is calling for a 2nd referendum on the EU remain or leave vote. A 2nd referendum is not required and is not democratic as the people have already voted and that result should be respected. Lets keep the 23rd June 2016 as Independence Day.
attributes.background: that there will never be a second referendum irrespective of the total turnout as long as the final count of votes is first past the post i.e. over 50%, as was the case on the 23rd June 2016 - Independence Day.
